name: postcss-token-utilities

1.0.0.name: postcss-token-utilities

scripts.clean: node -e "fs.rmSync('./dist', {recursive: true, force: true})" && mkdir dist
scripts.clean-build: npm run clean && npm run build

1.0.0.description: Token-driven utility CSS generator for PostCSS with JIT-style injection.
